reviews.review_msg: Sharon is by far the worst professor I have had during my four years of university. She is not only boring in lectures but also has very very unclear grading criteria and instructions for her assignments. She is a very tough marker and is very picky. I also found her feedback unclear. Avoid her class at all costs.
Inflexible. If you do not write in the way she expects, u can forget about getting a good grade. Basically, just go in like a sheep and follow what she says and how she thinks.
Sharon is an amazing prof! Shes very kind and caring and explains the material well. Easily one of the best profs Ive met throughout the years.

She is very sweet and engaging in class, however I found instructions to be unclear which left me feeling ill prepared to take on papers and projects. I also found her grading to be unclear. She is readily available if you need assistance. Don't take this class if you're looking for a GPA booster
